goal.en: This course will introduce the fundamental theory and basic knowledge of soil mechanics required for geotechnical problems. Explaining the basic design concepts and principles of geotechnical problems. Leading students to understand the relationship between geotechnical engineering and soil mechanical properties.
goal.ch: 本課程將介紹大地工程問題所須之學理與土壤力學基本知識，說明大地工程問題的基本設計概念與原理，讓同學了解大地工程與土壤力學特性關係。

content.en:
1.Nature of soil
Overview of soil behavior and soil index properties
2.Dry soil
stress in soil
Soil strength, stress-strain relationship and related tests
Earth pressure concept and retaining wall
Concept of carrying capacity and shallow foundation
3.Soil with water – No flow or Steady flow
effective stress concept
Seepage and filter design
Stress-strain relationship and drainage shear strength under drainage conditions
Retaining walls, slopes and shallow foundations under drainage conditions
4.Soil with water – Transient flow
Pore ​​water pressure under undrained conditions
compaction theory
content.ch:
1.Nature of soil
土壤行為概述及土壤指數性質
2.Dry soil
土壤中之應力
土壤強度、應力-應變關係與相關試驗
土壓力觀念與擋土牆
承載力觀念與淺基礎
3.Soil with water – No flow or Steady flow
有效應力觀念
滲流與濾層設計
排水條件下之應力-應變關係與排水剪力強度
排水條件下之擋土牆、邊坡與淺基礎
4.Soil with water – Transient flow
不排水條件下之孔隙水壓
壓密理論

textbook.en: Text: David F. McCarthy, 2014, Essential of Soil Mechanics and Foundation: Basic Geotechnics, 7th edition. Lambe and Whitman, 1979, Soil mechanics, SI Version. Reference: Das, Braja M., 2022, Principles of Geotechnical Engineering, , 10th edition.
textbook.ch: 教科書： David F. McCarthy, 2014, Essential of Soil Mechanics and Foundation: Basic Geotechnics, 7th edition. Lambe and Whitman, 1979, Soil mechanics, SI Version. 參考資料： Das, Braja M., 2022, Principles of Geotechnical Engineering, , 10th edition.

method.ch: 講授 研討 實習/實驗

grading.en: Homework and class exam 30％ Midterm exam 30％ Final exam 30％ Attendance and class participation 10％
grading.ch: 作業與隨堂考30％ 期中考30％ 期末考30％ 出席與課堂參與10％

flex_desc.en: Literature review, off-campus teaching, experimental operation
flex_desc.ch: 文獻選讀、校外教學、實驗操作

ch.Assessments: 紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習 ， 出席/課堂表現
